name: GAIA'S BESIEGE
description:
Try to protect the mother tree from being burned. Made in 7 days for LDJAM 50.

Controls:
  • Left mouse: Do action
  • Right mouse: Drag camera
  • Mouse wheel: Zoom in/out
Used assets:
  • Sprites from https://game-icons.net/    ((https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/))
  • Particles and ash sprite from https://www.kenney.nl/assets/particle-pack
  • Camera from https://github.com/carmel4a/RTS-Camera2D
  • Rubik Bubbles font https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Rubik+Bubbles
  • Fredoka one font https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Fredoka+One
